text: Jaime Delgado (born January 11, 1943) is a former Ecuadorian soccer player who played in the NASL. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |New York Cosmos |1971 |rowspan="2"|NASL |24||6||0||0||0||0||24||6 |- |Miami Gatos |1972 |1||0||0||0||0||0||1||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !25!!6!!0!!0!!0!!0!!25!!6 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian footballers Category:Ecuadorian expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:New York Cosmos players Category:Miami Toros players Category:North American Soccer League (1968–1984) players Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Ecuadorian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:1943 births
title: Jaime Delgado
